system:
note description: "[ Active lists that provide internal actions only exported to the EiffelVision2 implementation. ]" legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2009-06-03 17:11:49 -0700 (Wed, 03 Jun 2009) $" revision: "$Revision: 79073 $"
class ../interface/ev_active_list.xmlEV_ACTIVE_LIST [G]
inherit FalseACTIVE_LIST [G] redefine ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_default_createdefault_create, ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_make_filledmake_filled, ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_on_item_added_aton_item_added_at, ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_on_item_removed_aton_item_removed_at end
create ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_default_createdefault_create
create {../interface/ev_active_list.xmlEV_ACTIVE_LIST} ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_make_filledmake_filled
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_default_create../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_default_createdefault_create -- Initialize. do create ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_add_actionsinternal_add_actions create ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_remove_actionsinternal_remove_actions file#f_featurePrecursor {FalseACTIVE_LIST} end
f_make_filled../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_make_filledmake_filled (n: FalseINTEGER_32) -- Make filled. do create ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_add_actionsinternal_add_actions create ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_remove_actionsinternal_remove_actions file#f_featurePrecursor {FalseACTIVE_LIST} (n) end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I, ../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY} -- Implementation
f_on_item_added_at../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_on_item_added_aton_item_added_at (an_item: like Falseitem; item_index: FalseINTEGER_32) -- an_item has just been added at index item_index. local a_index: FalseINTEGER_32 do a_index := Falseindex ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_add_actionsinternal_add_actions.../interface/ev_lite_action_sequence.xml#f_callcall ([an_item]) Falseadd_actions.Falsecall ([an_item]) Falseindex := a_index end
f_on_item_removed_at../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_on_item_removed_aton_item_removed_at (an_item: like Falseitem; item_index: FalseINTEGER_32) -- an_item has just been removed at index item_index. local a_index: FalseINTEGER_32 do a_index := Falseindex ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_remove_actionsinternal_remove_actions.../interface/ev_lite_action_sequence.xml#f_callcall ([an_item]) Falseremove_actions.Falsecall ([an_item]) Falseindex := a_index end
f_internal_add_actions../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_add_actionsinternal_add_actions: ../interface/ev_lite_action_sequence.xmlEV_LITE_ACTION_SEQUENCE [like Falseitem] -- Actions performed when an item has just been added. -- Internal version not accessible by users, used by the -- EiffelVision implementation.
f_internal_remove_actions../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_remove_actionsinternal_remove_actions: ../interface/ev_lite_action_sequence.xmlEV_LITE_ACTION_SEQUENCE [like Falseitem] -- Actions performed when an item has just been removed. -- Internal version not accessible by users, used by the -- EiffelVision implementation.
invariant internal_add_actions_not_void: ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_add_actionsinternal_add_actions /= Void internal_remove_actions_not_void: ../interface/ev_active_list.xml#f_internal_remove_actionsinternal_remove_actions /= Void
note copyright: "Copyright (c) 1984-2006, Eiffel Software and others" license: "Eiffel Forum License v2 (see http://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txthttp://www.eiffel.com/licensing/forum.txt)" source: "[ Eiffel Software 356 Storke Road, Goleta, CA 93117 USA Telephone 805-685-1006, Fax 805-685-6869 Website http://www.eiffel.comhttp://www.eiffel.com Customer support http://support.eiffel.comhttp://support.eiffel.com ]"
end -- class ../interface/ev_active_list.xmlEV_ACTIVE_LIST
